Text.Page:
We need to hurt the pirate veterans and leaders.

Eliminate the Red Lash pirates in Freebooters' Roost and around the Pirate Captain's office in Pirate Grotto.

Take down the {@LinkCreature:11#1001#Red Lash pirate bosuns}, {@LinkCreature:11#1002#swashbucklers}, {@LinkCreature:11#1009#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:11#1010#archers}, {@LinkCreature:11#1011#petty officers}, {@LinkCreature:11#2006#raiders}, {@LinkCreature:11#2008#buccaneers} and {@LinkCreature:11#4005#overseers}.

Report to Matina when mission is complete.

Well done, . Keep up the good work.

Victory for Valkyon!
I'll reward you if you bring me the tokens from suppressing the leaders of the pirates.
